summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5275 for the improvement of the alley in Block 9, S. A. Bell's Addition, being the alley from Stewart Street to Virginia Street, between 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61030, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
